headings: Hardware support,A Guide to Setting Up Watchdog on Raspberry Pi
content: In the realm of Internet of Things (IoT), where devices communicate seamlessly to collect and exchange data, reliability is very important. Raspberry Pi serves as a versatile IoT gateway, facilitating the flow of information between devices and the cloud. However, ensuring continuous operation of the gateway is crucial for uninterrupted data flow. This guide focuses on simplifying the setup and configuration of watchdog on Raspberry Pi, enhancing its reliability as an IoT gateway and ensuring seamless data transmission in IoT ecosystems.
pageTitle: A Guide to Setting Up Watchdog on Raspberry Pi
